mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_equipments (user_id, template_id, enhance_level, socket1_gem_id, socket2_gem_id, is_equipped, is_locked, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{templateId}, #{enhanceLevel}, #{socket1GemId}, #{socket2GemId}, #{isEquipped}, #{isLocked}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_equipments SET enhance_level = #{enhanceLevel}, socket1_gem_id = #{socket1GemId}, socket2_gem_id = #{socket2GemId}, is_equipped = #{isEquipped}, is_locked = #{isLocked} WHERE id = #{id}
